description: Mia wants to introduce more literature and drama into Kaleido Stage`s performances. She runs her own website devoted to the Kaleido Stage and provides information on the show and its performers. Sora and Anna joined the Kaleido Stage at the same time as Mia and the three of them are good friends. She is very close with her family, especially her grandmother, who was in the hospital at the same time Mia was making her stage debut.
name: Mia Guillem
